opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgments affirmed.
Mr. Justice Musmanno took no part in the consideration or decision of this ease.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Hinkler v. Hoover et al., Appellants.
Argued October 10, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Irving 0. Murphy, with him MacDonald, Illig, Jones d Britton, for defendant, appellant.
James D. McDonald, Jr., with him Quinn, Plate, Gent, Buseek & Leemhuis, for additional defendant, appellant.
John W. Beatty, with him Knox, Graham, Pearson & McLaughlin, for appellee.
Thomas J. McCarthy, and Shreve, Sennett, McCarthy & Higgins, for appellee.
November 27, 1968:
